def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = 1
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] - amin
            s2 = b[i] - bmin
            res += max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = -1
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] - amin
            s2 = b[i] - bmin
            res += max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = 0
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] - amin
            s2 = b[i] - bmin
            res -= max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = 0
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] + amin
            s2 = b[i] - bmin
            res += max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = 0
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] * amin
            s2 = b[i] - bmin
            res += max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def minimum_moves_to_equalize_gifts(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, a, b) = case
        amin = min(a)
        bmin = min(b)
        res = 0
        for i in range(n):
            s1 = a[i] - amin
            s2 = b[i] * bmin
            res += max(s1, s2)
        results.append(res)
    return results
